import React from 'react' import styles from './index.module.css' import formatDistanceToNowStrict from 'date-fns/formatDistanceToNowStrict' import Avatar from '../photo' import Photo from '../photo' import * as ICON from '../icons' import IconButton from '../icon-button' function StructureTweet({name,mention,date,children,big}) { const untilNow = formatDistanceToNowStrict(date) let newText=[] newText.push(localStorage.getItem('TEXT')) return ( newText.map((tweet)=> { return (
{/* BAŞLA */}
{name} @{mention} • {untilNow}

{tweet}

5
12
{/* BİTİR */}
) }) ) } export default StructureTweet
